plot: Andy and Jeff are two down on their luck roommates who decide their best possible career choice is to be Internet reviewers. Only problem is they're broke, have no skills, and have no fans.
plot_en: Andy and Jeff are two down on their luck roommates who decide their best possible career choice is to be Internet reviewers. Only problem is they're broke, have no skills, and have no fans.
plot_es: Andy and Jeff are two down on their luck roommates who decide their best possible career choice is to be Internet reviewers. Only problem is they're broke, have no skills, and have no fans.
title: The Reviewers
